item.title: Keynote: We Are All Abbott and Costello
item.description:
Description

Marcia Riefer Johnston http://lanyrd.com/2015/writethedocs/sdmwxm/ Documentarians and technical writers have seen many changes in our professions in recent years, and there’s no sign of change slowing down. One thing endures: the writer's goal of communicating to understanding. It’s not as easy as it sounds. Because we are all Abbott and Costello.
item.dc:creator: Marcia Riefer Johnston
